description:
I won`t fall asleep tonight.
I`m waiting.
Touya receives this message from Yuki via Haruka. While he considers how to respond, he gets a call from a frantic Misaki.
Her script itself was accepted by the Drama Club, but the Drama Club president, with whom she has a past with, is forcing her to make all the props and clothes herself. The time limit is two weeks.
Touya happily offers to help Misaki, and she begins to calm down. After he gets off the phone, he runs to Yuki`s apartment, but finds Yayoi`s car parked in front. He turns around and leaves. The next day he reconsiders and goes back, but she isn`t there.
At the same time, Yuki is in Studio Tri-Sad, beginning the recording of the debut single that Eiji wrote for her, "White Album"...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Good Way to Forget Your Troubles... How About Getting Involved in Somebody Else`s?
Nayami o Wasureru Ii Houhou. Tanin no Trouble ni Kubi o Tsukkonde Mirutte no wa, Dou?
悩みを忘れるいい方法. 他人のトラブルに首を突っ込んでみるってのは, どう?
